Reviews.Title: What you should know
Reviews.Author: C. Chigama
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera that takes 127 film, which you can still order from places like B&H; Photo. However, you should know before purchasing any of these that the Brownie Holiday by Kodak has a collector value of 8 to 10 dollars so these are a little high. On the other hand, if you really like it ...

Reviews.Title: Vintage Kodak Brownie Holiday TLR Camera
Reviews.Author: Queen
Reviews.Content: I purchased this and had to send to my mother in the states.  I cannot give this product a good rating because I have not seem it yet.  But for now I will give it one star because I could not get it myself.  What looks good from a picture does not mean it will look good in person.  I 've had too many surprises lately.
